entry.title: PLATINUM SCHOOL FULL SLEEVE SHIRT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: SHIRT
Price: 6500.00

Description

Elevate your streetwear style with the Platinum School Full Sleeve Shirt, designed for premium comfort, effortless style, and lasting wear. Crafted from a soft, high-quality cotton blend, this oversized relaxed shirt offers a modern fit that moves with you while keeping things laid-back and stylish.

The split hem, button-up front, and subtle patchwork detailing bring texture and character to the clean design, making it a versatile piece for streetwear fashion. Its neutral tone pairs easily with denim, joggers, or layered looks, giving you endless styling options for every occasion.

A must-have for streetwear enthusiasts who value both style and quality.

Details

42% Polyester

18% cotton

30% viscose

10% lycra 

PATCH WORK

MACHINE REVERSE WASH

shipping

PRE-ORDER.

FREE DELIVERY PAN-INDIA.

DISPATCHES FROM SEPTEMBER 08.

entry.title: BRONZE SCHOOL FULL SLEEVE SHIRT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: SHIRT
Price: 6500.00

Description

This oversized relaxed fit shirt brings laid-back style with thoughtful details. Crafted from a soft cotton blend, it offers all-day comfort and easy movement without compromising on structure.

The full-sleeved design with oversized sleeves, regular collar, and split hem gives it a contemporary streetwear edge. Finished with subtle patchwork and a machine reverse wash, it adds texture and character to your look while staying versatile enough to layer or wear on its own.

Simple, comfortable, and effortlessly stylish – this oversized shirt is built for those who want relaxed fits with premium details.

Details

42% Polyester

18% cotton

30% viscose

10% lycra
